author: ceki
msg: Changes the ParamAction in Joran to allow for variable substitution in
the name of property as well as its value.
Modified the config files under tests/inpuit/db to handle variation in
the name of the url property. For example, the Oracle drivers refer to

author: ceki
msg: Options substitution now also allows for default values.
For example "${name:-John} will evaluate to John if there is no property
value for "name". This is similar to the way the Bash shell does things.
